channel.title: Does anyone want to do a community game? [Current: 2D MORPG called 'Moparmon']
channel.description:
[s]This is another sort of "survey" being conducted to see the popularity of doing a community game. There are many elements that need be decided, including genre, game play, mechanics, etc. All the basic stuff behind a game. Naturally, this game will be 2D, as we are reluctant to release anything 3D at this point in time. This survey is, of course, connected to [url=http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf]Mopar GameDev[/url].
Post in this topic if you will be able to contribute ideas, programming, or resources (graphics and sounds are very much needed, and are a lot harder to come by than code!) We need a collection of people working consistently together to get this to work. Frell, David, Spel, and I will be directing the project as it moves along. There will be a series of tutorials posted when the game is finished, and it will be run publicly so others can enjoy the work you all put into it. :)
Post if you like the idea and if you can help. If it gains enough popularity, this topic will move over to GameDev and we'll start from there. Thanks. :D[/s]
After settling on an idea, we now have an [url=http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516408.0.html]official development progress[/url] topic. Head on over there and keep the ideas flowing! :)

item.title: Does anyone want to do a community game? [Current: 2D MORPG called 'Moparmon']

@mod_taharok wrote:

item.title: Does anyone want to do a community game? [Current: 2D MORPG called 'Moparmon']
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Moparmon is going to have a full development plan that is suspected to be released late October. If we’re going to do this organization is key. Ben and I have some other things we need to clear up.

Start thinking of ideas :D! Feel free to go crazy and post your ideas here! remember, we aren’t going too far from pokemon but we can spice it up!

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone want to do a community game? [Current: 2D MORPG called 'Moparmon']
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:42, topic:413029”]Discussed it with taharok and its basically something we will probably do because the entire community is involved. Basically its just a community remake of pokemon, with a twist.

People can create (rational, no penismon etc) moparmons, write descriptions for entry in the mopardex etc. People can sign up to make the complete sprite packs for certain towns, and have the town named what they want, hopefully enough people will make towns that we fill up the map.

more info coming soon![/quote]

That’s not a bad idea! Dynamically expanding map… They’ll have to be reviewed very closely before being approved though

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone want to do a community game? [Current: 2D MORPG called 'Moparmon']
